Score: 0
Level: 1

Game Description

(1) When the game start, click all the black
tiles but NO white tiles
(2) After 10 black tiles are clicked,
the level of speed will increased
(3) The game will stop when
any white tile is clicked
or any black tile is missed, i.e a black tile
has rolled outside the border without being
clicked
(4) Press Restart to play again
